name: SHSession
desc: An object that manages matching a specific audio recording when a segment of that recording is part of captured sound.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new session object for matching songs in the Shazam Music catalog.

items.name: init(catalog: SHCatalog)
items.desc: Creates a new session for matching audio in a custom catalog.

items.name: func match(SHSignature)
items.desc: Searches for the query signature in the reference signatures that the session catalog contains.

items.name: func matchStreamingBuffer(AVAudioPCMBuffer, at: AVAudioTime?)
items.desc: Converts the audio in the buffer to a signature, and searches the reference signatures in the session catalog.

items.name: var delegate: SHSessionDelegate?
items.desc: The object that the session calls with the result of a match request.

items.name: var catalog: SHCatalog
items.desc: The catalog object containing the reference signatures and their associated metadata that the session uses to perform matches.
